=========================
scdummyloc documentation
=========================

This is the documentation for the ``scdummyloc`` pick associator module.

License
-------

The ``scdummyloc`` module is free and open-source. Currently, it is
distributed under the `GNU Affero General Public License`_ (Free Software
Foundation, version 3 or later).
